text: Arau yisakale yuluma karaiche, prthiraita thaka sakalo bastu yadi sihamtara hai yaya lagate iyara samaparaimana bastu'o yadi sihamtara thake, tente kiyamatara dina kathina sastira paraa raksa pabalai muktipanasbaraupa se'i sakalo sihamte di diba arau sihamtara babe allahara taraphara paraa enekuraa kiba prakasita haâ€™ba yito sihamte kalpana'o karaiba paraa na'i
